original_text: Listen to me! I will put a spirit into the king of Assyria's mind. He will hear a report which will cause him to return to his own country. There, in his own land, I will cause someone to kill him with a sword.” ’
korean_text: 보라 내가 영을 그의 속에 두리니 그가 소문을 듣고 그의 고국으로 돌아갈 것이며 또 내가 그를 그의 고국에서 칼에 죽게 하리라 하셨느니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: I will put a spirit into the king of Assyria's mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 앗수르 왕의 마음에 한 영을 넣으리니

sentences.original_text: which will cause him to return to his own country.
I will cause someone to kill him with a sword.
